term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - chimney effect in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: chimney effect

item.text: A vertical movement of a localized mass of air or other gases which occurs due to local temperature differences.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2179 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
